navmid.graph
Class DisplayableNode

java.lang.Object
  navmid.graph.Node
      navmid.graph.ObjectNode
          navmid.graph.DisplayableNode

public class DisplayableNode
extends ObjectNode

Class describing the screen contents which are the main nodes of the navigation graphs (other nodes are build artefacts).

Author:
piac6784

defaultColor

public java.awt.Color defaultColor()
Description copied from class: Node
Gives back the default color associated to the class of objects. This method is usually overridden by subclasses. It is recommended to use soft default color and use bright colors for temporary events.

Overrides:
defaultColor in class Node
Returns:
this default color

isInstanceOf

public boolean isInstanceOf(java.lang.String c)
Description copied from class: ObjectNode
Used on object nodes usually to check if they represent instances of a given class. This is used to implement the instanceof test and must give back a correct approximation.

Overrides:
isInstanceOf in class ObjectNode
Parameters:
c - the name of the class.
Returns:
